thread.title: METRON Community
thread.title_full: American Image reviewed by METRON Community

author: METRON Community
title: METRON Community
text: Working with American Image was easy. The kept in touch to answer questions and provide technical explanations for graphics. We are very pleased with the quality of the pop up signs we ordered. The substantial fabric looks like it will withstand outdoor elements well, and the metal used for the tension and "folding" part of the signs looks like it will stay viable for many weekly openings and foldings of the signs to store! Thanks AI...
